titleStmt.title: A testimony against Jeffrey Bullock, his antichristian and foolish pamphlet stiled Antichrist's transformation within discovered by the light within wherein his perverse spirit, darkness and whimsical conceits are reprehended by the true light.
titleStmt.author: Barnadiston, G. (Giles), d. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
